meanings.definition: Extremely complex and difficult to follow or understand.
meanings.sent1: The convoluted instructions left me confused.
meanings.sent2: The convoluted plot of the movie made it hard to follow.
meanings.sent3: The convoluted maze in the game was both frustrating and amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her convoluted reasoning twisted around like a tangled thread.
meanings.sent5: The convoluted puzzle required hours of careful unraveling.

meanings.sent1: The convoluted vines wrapped around the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The convoluted rope lay in a tangled heap on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The convoluted phone cord seemed to have a life of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a convoluted mess of curls and waves.
meanings.sent5: The convoluted path through the forest twisted and turned unpredictably.
